charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_0100:
Thanks a bunch for training with us,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_0302_0400: I thought I was gonna lose...
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_0700:
I guess we might be doing something right if we’re
putting up a good fight against
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_0301_0800:
Have you decided on some kind
of goal?
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_0401_0900: Well...it’s not really a goal, but...
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_0302_1000: You’ve been battling a lot lately.
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_0402_1100: Yeah. I’ve been kind of thinking recently...
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_1200:
I’ve been thinking that being strong enough to
protect the things that are precious to you is
definitely important.
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_1300:
Maybe I shouldn’t only be having fun with my
Pokémon every day...
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_1400:
so I can ensure that our peaceful times aren’t
destroyed by anyone else.
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_1500:
I’m starting to think that I should at least be strong
enough to protect myself.
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_1600:
Of course, I’m not gonna focus ONLY on training
with my face all scrunched up, like Paulo used to!
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_1700:
Like Colress said, we can’t get too caught up in
one or the other.
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_1800:
But I also think there are times when you have to
be decisive.
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_2300:
Flareon...or really, Eevee...was the very first
Pokémon I got when I started out as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_2400:
You know how Eevee can evolve into lots of
different Pokémon, right?
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_2500:
I chose to evolve Eevee into Flareon because its
burning flames and passion were the best fit
for me!
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_2600:
I really thought hard about it before arriving at
that conclusion, though!
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_2700:
I love exercising, so I was thinking Vaporeon and
Glaceon would be great because they’re nice
and chilly...
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_2800:
And Jolteon’s really fast, so it would’ve made a
great running partner I could compete with.
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_2900:
But in the end, I think Flareon’s got it won in terms
of fluffiness!
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_0401_3100:
Oooh, are you a fan of the fluff, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_0402_3300: He sure is! Wanna feel this fluff firsthand?
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_3400:
Oh, but Flareon doesn’t usually let anyone else
but me get up in his fluff.
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_3600:
He’s saying if you beat us in battle, he’d be OK
with it!
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_3700: Looks like I got it right!
charaepi_ch0105_01_rival2/2301_1201_3900: We’re definitely gonna win this one!
